meanings.definition: Not causing or promoting the formation of comedones (blackheads or whiteheads) in the skin.
meanings.sent1: Using noncomedogenic products can help prevent skin breakouts.
meanings.sent2: It is important to choose noncomedogenic skincare for acne-prone skin.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her noncomedogenic lotion was like a shield against pimples.
meanings.sent4: The noncomedogenic sunscreen acted like a protective barrier for her skin.
meanings.sent5: The noncomedogenic makeup kept her face clear and smooth all day.
